title: Beatbob
subtitle: a Discord music bot
description:
There's a plethora of high-end Discord music bots out there—backed by years of development and hundreds of hours of manpower. So I asked myself:

“Why not create my own?”

title: Sudoku Solver
subtitle: it does what it says
description:
One of my earlier deepdives into figuring out an algorithm. Curiosity lead to Wikipedia, which lead to backward propagation.

Now “I” can solve Sudokus.
